actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Administrative Practice&Procedure.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Administrative Practice and Procedure

official_title: A bill for the relief of J. L. Simmons Company, Inc. of Chicago, Illinois.

summary.text: Authorizes and directs the Secretary of the Treasury to pay a specified sum to a named corporation in full satisfaction of all claims against the United States for expenses incurred due to misinformation by the United States relating to the construction of a Veterans Administration hospital to be built by such corporation.

titles.title: A bill for the relief of J. L. Simmons Company, Inc. of Chicago, Illinois.
